Text: PDCI Rerate for Bill NonPrivilegedpst Market Notification After the DayAhead Market closed PDCI TTC NS was changed from to MW and SN was changed from MW to MW starting HE for operating day This was due to return of the BPA Celilo Valve Group The first applicable hour to run with the adjusted rating in the HourAhead Market is HE for Inquiries please call Please address realtime operational inquiries to the RealTime scheduling desk at The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

PDCI Derate for Bill NonPrivilegedpst Market Notification After the DayAhead Market closed PDCI TTC NS was changed from to MW and SN was changed from MW to MW starting HE for operating day This was due to unavailability of the BPA Celilo Valve Group The first applicable hour to run with the adjusted rating in the HourAhead Market is HE for Inquiries please call Please address realtime operational inquiries to the RealTime scheduling desk at The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

Rating Changes to COI PDCI Path and for Bill NonPrivilegedpst Market Notification After the Day Ahead Market ran for the COI Branch Group Path limit was changed from to MW NS and from to MW SN for HE through HE From HE through HE NS Path was changed from to MW and from to MW SN In addition the NOB Branch Group Path the SN was changed from to MW and SN was changed from to MW Path NS was changed from to MW and Path NS MW to MW Path and in the SouthNorth directions will remain as prescheduled This is due to the Los BanosGates Line Series cap being removed from service The first applicable hour to submit adjusted schedules in the HourAhead market is HE Please address realtime operational inquiries to the Real Time scheduling desk at sent by Market Operations

URGENT NOTICEBill NonPrivilegedpst Market Participants Due to the unusual events occurring on the East Coast the CAISO is anticipating the possibility of having some difficulty facilitating todays Hour Ahead Markets and tomorrows Day Ahead Market The CAISO is not suspending either Market at this time however the possibility for the suspension for one or more markets exists The CAISO will continue to facilitate the Hour Ahead Market as long as balanced schedules are submitted A decision to suspend the Day Ahead Market for operating day will be made by PST today Please contact the CAISO Hour Ahead Operator upon receipt of this message

COI Path Path derate extendedBill NonPrivilegedpst After the Day ahead market ran the COI branch group TTC in the NS direction was changed from MW to MW and the Path branch group TTC in the NS direction was changed from MW to MW and the Path branch group TTC in the NS direction was changed from MW to MW for HEs through for operating day The reasons for the change is they were removed from service due to a low battery alarm The first applicable Hour Ahead market to run with these values is HE The ISO will update you of any changes in line rating status Sent by Market Operations inquiries please call the Hour Ahead Desk The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

HE HourAhead Market RePublishedBill NonPrivilegedpst Market Notification The HE HourAhead Market for has been republished Inquires call The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

Rerate to COI and NOB Branch GroupsBill NonPrivilegedpst Market Notification After the Day Ahead Market ran for Friday for the operating day the COI Branch Group Path limit was changed from to MW NS and from to MW SN In addition the NOB Branch Group Path the NS was changed from to MW and SN was changed from to MW This rerate is due to the cancellation of scheduled work from HE to HE Sent by Market Operations The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

USF Mitigation Path Bill NonPrivilegedpst PDT WACM TERMINATES REQUEST FOR COORDINATED OPERATION OF CONTROLLABLE DEVICES FOR PATH USF MITIGATION Transfer Path Path TOT A Path transfer capability at time of message MW Path instantaneous flow at time of message MW Schedule across path at time of message MW The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

SI Server is DownBill NonPrivilegedpst URGENT NOTIFICATION SI Servers UNAVAILABLE

SI FallForwardBill NonPrivilegedpst URGENT NOTIFICATION SI Servers UNAVAILABLE Tuesday August th to pst as we will be FallingForward to our Primary server in Folsom Please submit all Hour Ahead schedules for August th HE and and Supplemental Energy schedules for and prior to Once the SI system is available Please point your webbrowsers to our Primary server in Folsom by utilizing the following URL iso Also please be advised that you should clear the Netscape cache close all open Netscape windows and restart Netscape before attempting to log onto the primary site Please contact Benik DerGevorgian or Michael Glatz if you have any questions or concerns Thank you ISO Market Operations

CAISO NotificationSI Server UnavailableBill NonPrivilegedpst URGENT NOTIFICATION SI Server maintenance will be done TODAY Monday July to pdt In case of SI system trouble we will Fallback to our backup SI server in Alhambra Please submit all Hour Ahead schedules for July th HE and Supplemental Energy schedules for prior to If the fallback is PERFORMED Please clear your memory and disk caches Edit Preferences Advanced Cache close all Netscape windows including messages Restart Netscape and point your browsers to our Backup server by utilizing the following URL iso We will provide additional notification to you Please contact Eddie Ledesma or Benik DerGevorgian if you have any questions or concerns Thank you ISO Market Operations

Termination of Coordinated Operation of Controllable devicesBill NonPrivilegedpst System Notification At PDT PAC Sent the following WSCCnet message In accordance with WSCC Unscheduled Flow Reduction Procedure this message is to advise you that the request for Coordinated Operation of Controllable devices for Path mitigation is hereby terminated The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice

Coordinated Operation of Controllable devicesBill NonPrivilegedpst System Notification At PDT PAC sent the following WSCC Telenet message Path is experiencing high clockwise unscheduled flow Net schedule on the Path has been reduced to of the transfer limit and the actual flow remains at or higher PAC now requests coordinated operation of controllable devices to take effect this hour Path limit MW with actual flow of MW Schedules on the path are MW Please check your schedules The system conditions described in this communication are dynamic and subject to change While the ISO has attempted to reflect the most current accurate information available in preparing this notice system conditions may change suddenly with little or no notice
